discussion_comments.comment_body: This woudn't work if we add pinned tabs AFTER setting the listeners. I recommend adding `gBrowser.tabContainer.addEventListener()` and check if the originalTarget is the tab label
No need. It adds this listener to every single tab. `renameTabStart` checks to make sure the tab is pinned.
Even if the event listener is added to the tabContainer, event.target will still point to the tab element
